title: Smart Data Models - SeasonDayTypeSchedule
description: Adapted from CIM data models. A time schedule covering a 24 hour period, with curve data for a specific type of season and day.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be SeasonDayTypeSchedule

DayType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Schedules that use this DayType. Default: None

Season.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Schedules that use this Season. Default: None
